name: The planet's rescuer
description: Protect the Earth inhabitants against attacks of alien space ships. The “orbital space tank” is at your complete disposal.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD Athlon X2 Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 220 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 Processor Phenom II X4 B95 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1030 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
